name: Social Vend
slogan: Welcome to the future of brand engagement
description: We build smart socially activated vending machines for the advertising and experiential markets. By encouraging consumers to interact with your brand in return for a free gift, you will create a fun and memorable experience for everyone involved. Social vending raises brand awareness and creates social amplification of your brand message across the users entire network of followers and friends.

jobs.title: Mid-level Frontend Engineer
jobs.description:
About Social Vend

We have been creating interactive and rewarding social experiences through smart vending machines and interactive kiosks for the past 4 years. Our custom built machines are mostly used for short term events and long term installs to help advertisers and retailers better understand their audience. We have worked with some of the worlds largest brands including McDonalds, RedBull and Pepsi to name a few.

We are also releasing an operating system (vendOS - vendos.io) that allows easy configuration of the machine via a touchscreen, an sdk to build interactive storefronts using web technologies and finally a cloud platform to deploy the built code and monitor the machines health. 


The Role

Your main roles will be pushing the UI that lives on the machine forwards and collaborating on the cloud platform (we have some big plans for this side of things).

Our Stack:

React

Redux

Node Js

Postgres

Redis

Typescript

Docker

AWS


We offer successful candidates:

Competitive salary
Stock options
Flexible working from home when needed
Friday night drinks
Gym membership
Top spec machine 
Relaxed starting time


To apply:

Please send over a short email with any examples of your previous work or side projects and a CV to -  ollie@socialvend.com

Interview Process:

CV + work review
Short technical screening call
in-person meet the team (not a formal interview, just a meet the gang)

We are looking to fill this role quickly, so no lengthily interview process!
